vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μοιχ-ᾰλίς, ίδος
(also accusative μοιχαλίν [LXX+NT+3rd c.AD+]; in religious sense, unfaithful to God, [NT]: so as adjective, adulterous, γενεά [NT]
__II ={μοιχεία}, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
adulteress; (a.) adulterous
an adulteress, Rom. 7:3; Jas. 4:4; by metonymy, an adulterous appearance, lustful significance, 2Pet. 2:14; from the Hebrew, spiritually adulterous, faithless, ungodly, Mt. 12:39; 16:4; Mk. 8:38*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: adúltero (adúltera) ; infiel (hombres y mujeres SAN.4:4) ; personas infieles o sin Dios
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 淫婦
1a) 字意
1b) 喻意
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 淫妇
1a) 字意
1b) 喻意
